displaytitle: St. Joseph with his flowering staff
medium: Pen and brown ink with brown wash on cream laid paper
creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
markings:
Watermark: bird on triple mound in circle;

Stamped, lower right: "B" (Collector's stamp of E. Bouverie (Lugt 325) (See reference Bib. 4661);

titles.title: St. Joseph with his flowering staff

makers.displaydate: 1591–1666; born Cento, Italy; died Bologna, Italy

texts.textentryhtml:
E. Bouverie; Parsons; Purchased by Platt from Parsons, 1922.;

[dated] 1630s (Mahon);
